recipes.title: Easy Spaghetti with Garlic Butter
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions. While pasta cooks, melt butter in a saucepan. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute. Drain pasta, reserve some pasta water. Toss with garlic butter, add water as needed. Season and stir in parsley.

recipes.title: Simple Chicken Alfredo
ingredients: 1 lb chicken breast, cut into strips
recipes.instructions: Cook fettuccine. Heat oil in a skillet, cook seasoned chicken until done. Remove. Simmer cream, stir in Parmesan. Add pasta and chicken. Toss to coat.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Tacos
recipes.instructions: Warm tortillas. Mix beans, corn, onion. Spoon into tortillas, top with avocado and hot sauce.

recipes.title: One-Pot Mac and Cheese
recipes.instructions: Combine macaroni and milk in pot. Simmer until tender. Stir in cheese, salt, and pepper until creamy.

recipes.title: Grilled Lemon Herb Chicken
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken with all ingredients for 30 mins. Grill over medium heat for 6–7 mins per side.

recipes.title: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
recipes.instructions: Sauté mushrooms. Add rice, toast lightly. Add wine, stir. Add broth gradually, stirring. Finish with butter and Parmesan.

recipes.title: Quick Shrimp Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Heat oil, cook garlic and shrimp for 2 mins. Add veggies and soy sauce. Stir-fry 5–6 mins more.

recipes.title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
recipes.instructions: Cook quinoa. Roast sweet potato. Arrange with chickpeas, avocado, and drizzle tahini dressing.

recipes.title: Classic Beef Tacos
recipes.instructions: Brown beef, add seasoning. Spoon into taco shells. Top with lettuce and tomatoes.

recipes.title: Savory Zucchini Fritters
recipes.instructions: Squeeze water from zucchini. Mix with egg, flour, seasoning. Fry spoonfuls in hot oil until golden.

recipes.title: Baked Salmon with Dill
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Place salmon on foil. Drizzle oil, sprinkle dill, top with lemon slices. Bake 15 mins.

recipes.title: Garlic Butter Steak Bites
recipes.instructions: Season steak. Sear in hot pan. Add butter and garlic, cook 1 min. Garnish with parsley.

recipes.title: Chickpea Curry
recipes.instructions: Sauté onion and garlic. Add curry powder, chickpeas, and coconut milk. Simmer 15 mins.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.instructions: Cut tops off peppers. Mix rice, beef, sauce. Fill peppers. Bake at 375°F for 25 mins. Top with cheese.

recipes.title: Egg Fried Rice
recipes.instructions: Scramble eggs in oil, push to side. Add rice and peas, stir-fry. Add soy sauce and mix. Top with green onion.

recipes.title: Roasted Veggie Pasta
recipes.instructions: Roast vegetables at 425°F for 20 mins. Cook pasta. Toss pasta with veggies, oil, and seasoning.

recipes.title: Honey Garlic Chicken Thighs
recipes.instructions: Mix soy, honey, garlic. Marinate chicken. Sear in pan until cooked through. Spoon sauce over top.

recipes.title: Spinach and Feta Quesadilla
recipes.instructions: Heat oil in skillet. Add tortilla, layer fillings, top with another tortilla. Cook until golden and flip.

recipes.title: Turkey Zucchini Burgers
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients. Form into patties. Grill or pan-fry for 4–5 mins per side.

recipes.title: Coconut Lentil Soup
recipes.instructions: Sauté onion and garlic. Add lentils, turmeric, and water. Simmer 20 mins. Stir in coconut milk and serve.

recipes.title: Baked Teriyaki Salmon
recipes.instructions: Place salmon on foil, pour teriyaki sauce, wrap. Bake at 400°F for 15 mins. Garnish with sesame seeds and green onion.

recipes.title: Chinese Eggplant with Garlic Sauce
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry eggplant in oil. Mix garlic, soy, sugar, and cornstarch with water. Add sauce to eggplant and cook until thick.

recipes.title: Creamy Tomato Tortellini Soup
recipes.instructions: Sauté garlic in oil. Add tomatoes and broth, bring to simmer. Add tortellini and cook per package instructions.

recipes.title: Sweet Potato Black Bean Tacos
recipes.instructions: Roast sweet potatoes with oil and cumin. Warm beans and tortillas. Fill tacos and top with sour cream.

recipes.title: Sheet Pan Chicken Fajitas
recipes.instructions: Toss everything with seasoning and oil. Roast on sheet pan at 425°F for 25 mins. Serve with tortillas.

recipes.title: Cheesy Garlic Breadsticks
recipes.instructions: Roll out dough. Brush with garlic butter. Top with cheese. Bake at 375°F for 15 mins.

recipes.title: Beef and Bean Chili
recipes.instructions: Cook beef, add beans, tomatoes, and spices. Simmer for 30 mins. Serve with toppings of choice.

recipes.title: Crispy Baked Chicken Wings
recipes.instructions: Toss wings with baking powder and seasoning. Bake on rack at 425°F for 40 mins until crispy.

recipes.title: Creamy Pesto Gnocchi
recipes.instructions: Boil gnocchi until they float. Simmer pesto and cream. Toss with gnocchi and cheese.

recipes.title: Quinoa and Black Bean Salad
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Chill before serving. Adjust seasoning to taste.
